name: Dark Magellan (Demo)
description:
Made this on a very strict time schedule, not as refined as I'd like. It's a very straightforward space shooter where you survive for 90 seconds against waves of enemies and then there's a boss. I wish I had more time to work on this but I'm glad I have at least something to show.

Controls:
Arrow Keys to move
Space Bar to Fire

Song on title screen: Epic Battles and Adventures in Space by MotionRide
